comments.raw_text:
My setup: Macbook Pro early 2011 Mac Os X 10.6.8. with an additional display, which set to master (menu dragged). I use ff in built-in dispalay

When i try open download, page source, etc window won't display. New browser window works corretly. When i move ff to outer (master) display all above works correctly.

I can reproduce this bug.
